title: Just bought the Conqueror Karma Bundle and
body: I didn't get the conqueror frame for the loading, why?

replies.body: It looks like we were having a little problem with that frame not loading correctly at first. It should be fixed as of now, and I *think* the frame is tied to the icon and skin. Give that a go in a custom/practice game and let me know if it's working for you now.
Thanks had the same problem; it is working fine now
what if i just buy the skin ? will i get the frame too ?
This is probably late for me to tell you this, but no you won't get the icon or the frame unless u buy the bundle.
